sentences.en: A freelance career has the attraction of flexibility.
sentences.cn: 自由职业具有诱人的灵活性.

sentences.en: As a cover story he generally tells people he is a freelance photographer.
sentences.cn: 为掩饰身份，他一般对外称自己是一名自由摄影师。

sentences.en: Because the reason you freelance is for the freedom, right?
sentences.cn: 你选择做自由职业者的原因就是自由，是吧？

sentences.en: Beethoven was extremely influential as among the first composers to work freelance rather than being employed full-time by a royal or ecclesiastic patron.
sentences.cn: 贝多芬作为并非全职供职于皇家和教会赞助人，而作为自由职业者的首位作曲家而极具影响力。

sentences.en: Every once in a while I have an open hour for my freelance clients - they can give me a call about anything they like.
sentences.cn: 作为自由职业者，每隔一段时间，我会拿出一个小时给我的客户 - 他们可以打电话给我，聊他们愿意聊的事。

sentences.en: For example, the appearance of freelance shows that work with fixed working hours-9 to 5-can be changed?
sentences.cn: 比如说，自由职业者的出现证明固定的工作时间——9点到5点——可以改变。

sentences.en: He derives his income from freelance work.
sentences.cn: 他以自由职业获取收入.

sentences.en: He is now working freelance from his home in Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 他现在在汉普郡的家里从事自由职业工作。

sentences.en: He wants to work for a newspaper, he is a freelance writer.
sentences.cn: 他想去报社工作, 他是一名自由撰稿人.

sentences.en: I went freelance when my son Adam was born, and have never looked back.
sentences.cn: 我在儿子亚当出世后开始从事自由职业，自此一帆风顺。

sentences.en: I'm still working as a freelance consultant at the moment.
sentences.cn: 此刻我还仅仅是个自由咨询顾问.

sentences.en: Jill was starting to get some freelance writing jobs from trade magazines.
sentences.cn: 吉尔开始从一些行业杂志接点自由撰稿的活儿。

sentences.en: Many people prefer to freelance from home.
sentences.cn: 许多人愿意在家当自由职业者.

sentences.en: Michael Cross is a freelance journalist.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔·克罗斯是一名自由新闻记者。

sentences.en: Molly M. Ginty is a freelance writer based in New York.
sentences.cn: MollyMGinty是纽约自由撰稿人. 环境污染物是如何引起生殖问题的?

sentences.en: Read up on business: The fact that you’re reading this blog is a good sign — you can get a ton of information about running your freelance business online.
sentences.cn: 研习商务：事实上，你阅读这篇博客是一个好的现象，因为从中你可以知道许多关于自由职业者如何经营自己事业的信息。

sentences.en: She gets enormous pleasure out of working freelance.
sentences.cn: 做自由职业者让她体会到无穷的快乐。

sentences.en: She works freelance from home.
sentences.cn: 她在家做自由职业者。

sentences.en: Simon Lane quickly found his niche as a busy freelance model maker.
sentences.cn: 西蒙·莱恩很快找到了适合自己的位置，成了一名忙碌的模型制作的自由职业者。

sentences.en: The going rate for freelance work is 5 an hour.
sentences.cn: 自由职业者的现行酬金是每小时5英镑.

sentences.en: Then you might create a resume and start looking for work based on what positions you feel qualified for, or you might go freelance and/or build a business around your capabilities.
sentences.cn: 接着你就可以着手写简历、根据你认为有能力担当的职位寻找工作，或者做自由职业，或者/以及围绕你的能力开创自己的事业。

sentences.en: Vanya Kewley is a freelance film producer.
sentences.cn: 万尼亚·丘利是自由电影制片人。

words.tran_cn: 自由地；免费地；大量地；慷慨地；直率地
自由保有；[会计] 不动产所有权
自由民；享有市民权的人；荣誉市民
使自由；解放（free的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: working independently for different companies rather than being employed by one particular company
